content: Sept 6 Deere & Co  known for its trademark green tractors  said on Wednesday it would acquire privately-held Blue River Technology for $305 million to increase the machine-learning capabilities of its farm equipment. California-based Blue River has designed technology that helps farmers reduce the use of herbicides by spraying only where weeds are present  optimizing the use of inputs in farming  Deere said in a statement.
name: Deere & Company
title: Deere to buy agtech company Blue River for $305 mln

content: NEW YORK  Aug 16 Deere & Co.'s John Deere said on Sunday it has suspended operations near the Chinese port of Tianjin indefinitely after huge explosions there last week killed more than 100 people and injured some of the company's 1 300 workers.
name: Deere & Company
title: Damage from Tianjin blasts keeps John Deere factory closed

content: CHICAGO Deere & Co  on Friday reported a higher-than-expected quarterly profit and raised its full-year outlook after cost cuts helped compensate for weakening demand for its farm equipment.
name: Deere & Company
title: Deere raises 2015 profit outlook despite weak farm market

content: CHICAGO  May 22 Deere & Co on Friday reported a higher-than-expected quarterly profit and raised its full-year outlook after cost cuts helped compensate for weakening demand for its farm equipment.

title: UPDATE 2-Deere raises 2015 profit outlook despite weak farm market

content: CHICAGO  May 22 Farm equipment maker Deere & Co  posted a sharply lower quarterly net profit on Friday as a weak global agriculture sector hurt sales  but still came in handily above market expectations.
name: Deere & Company
title: Deere 2nd-qtr profit falls  hit by weak global agriculture sector

content: May 19 Google Inc and two venture capitalist firms are investing $15 million in a U.S. tech company that helps farmers maximize their crops based on data gathered by agricultural equipment and shared between growers.
name: Deere & Company
title: Google Ventures leads $15 million deal in Farmers Business Network

content: May 15 Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc  on Friday said it has boosted its holdings in some of the billionaire's favorite companies  including Wells Fargo & Co  and International Business Machines Corp.
name: Deere & Company
title: UPDATE 1-Buffett's Berkshire adds to favorites IBM  Wells Fargo

content: CHICAGO Across the U.S. Midwest  the plunge in grain prices to near four-year lows is pitting landowners determined to sustain rental incomes against farmer tenants worried about making rent payments because their revenues are squeezed.
name: Deere & Company
title: Rent walkouts point to strains in U.S. farm economy

content: NEW YORK  Feb 17 Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway Inc on Tuesday disclosed a 5 percent stake in agricultural equipment maker Deere & Co and said it shed a $3.74 billion investment in oil company Exxon Mobil Corp  as oil prices plunged.
name: Deere & Company
title: UPDATE 1-Buffett's Berkshire builds Deere stake  dumps Exxon

content: NEW YORK  Feb 5 A U.S. judge dismissed the bulk of two lawsuits by bankrupt wireless venture LightSquared and equity owner Harbinger Capital Partners accusing Deere & Co  and other GPS firms of misleading them about interference concerns and hastening the company's insolvency.
name: Deere & Company
title: Judge rejects most of LightSquared claims against Deere  GPS firms

content: CHICAGO  Jan 23 Deere & Co  the world's largest maker of farm equipment  will lay off more than 900 employees at plants in Iowa and Illinois in the latest round of job cuts spurred by a decline in grain prices that is hurting demand for agricultural machinery.
name: Deere & Company
title: Deere to cut more than 900 U.S. workers as farm economy weakens
